data.message: Is there anyway that someone at Facebook can look into reviews that are being written about a certain business on facebook.  The business will only offer a refund if reviews are written making them look good.

replies.message: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Alison! To report a business on Facebook, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2hnVRpd. Be sure to include a screenshot of what you are seeing so we can better address the issue. -Elizabeth
